languages.text: "Ну а я..." {n}Распаленный великан набирает воздух в грудь, но внезапно задумывается.{/n} "{name}... А ведь мне доводилось слыхать о тебе. Ты и впрямь, говорят, тверд{mf||а} сердцем и в свое время недурно себя показал{mf||а}".

"Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."
languages.original_text: "Ну а я..." {n}Распаленный великан набирает воздух в грудь, но внезапно задумывается.{/n} "{name}... А ведь мне доводилось слыхать о тебе. Ты и впрямь, говорят, тверд{mf||а} сердцем и в свое время недурно себя показал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

"Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

"Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

"Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

languages.text: “嗯，我可……”{n}恼怒的巨人深吸了一口气，随后突然住了口。{/n}“{name}……我确实听说过这个名字。所有人都说你是个坚决果敢的人，你已经证明了你的力量。”
languages.original_text: "Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，我可……”{n}恼怒的巨人深吸了一口气，随后突然住了口。{/n}“{name}……我确实听说过这个名字。所有人都说你是个坚决果敢的人，你已经证明了你的力量。”

languages.text: «Pues...». {n}El iracundo gigante coge aire, y de pronto se detiene, pensativo.{/n} «{name}... ese nombre me suena. Por lo que dicen, es fuerte de corazón y ha demostrado repetidamente su valía».
languages.original_text: "Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

traits.locale_text: «Pues...». {n}El iracundo gigante coge aire, y de pronto se detiene, pensativo.{/n} «{name}... ese nombre me suena. Por lo que dicen, es fuerte de corazón y ha demostrado repetidamente su valía».

languages.text: 「ああ、俺は…」{n}激怒した大男は胸に息を吸い込んだが、突如考えるのを止めた。{/n}「{name}…お前のことは聞いたことがある。真に勇敢な者であり、その力を証明したことがあると」
languages.original_text: "Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、俺は…」{n}激怒した大男は胸に息を吸い込んだが、突如考えるのを止めた。{/n}「{name}…お前のことは聞いたことがある。真に勇敢な者であり、その力を証明したことがあると」

languages.text: « Eh bien, je... » {n}Le géant furieux inspire un grand coup, mais s'interrompt soudain pour réfléchir.{/n} « {name}... Ce nom ne m'est pas inconnu. On dit que vous avez un cœur vaillant et que vous avez plus d'une fois fait vos preuves par le passé. »
languages.original_text: "Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, je... » {n}Le géant furieux inspire un grand coup, mais s'interrompt soudain pour réfléchir.{/n} « {name}... Ce nom ne m'est pas inconnu. On dit que vous avez un cœur vaillant et que vous avez plus d'une fois fait vos preuves par le passé. »

languages.text: "Nun, ich ..." {n}Der zornige Riese atmet tief ein, hält dann aber plötzlich inne.{/n} "{name} ... Ich glaube, ich habe von Euch gehört. Ihr seid wirklich mutig, heißt es, und habt Euch in der Vergangenheit bewiesen."
languages.original_text: "Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, ich ..." {n}Der zornige Riese atmet tief ein, hält dann aber plötzlich inne.{/n} "{name} ... Ich glaube, ich habe von Euch gehört. Ihr seid wirklich mutig, heißt es, und habt Euch in der Vergangenheit bewiesen."

languages.original_text: "Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

languages.text: "Ben..." {n}Öfkeden deliye dönen dev, ciğerlerini havayla doldurup düşünmek için aniden duraksıyor.{/n} "{name}... Sanırım adını duymuştum. Gerçekten de yiğit olduğunu ve geçmişte kendini kanıtladığını söylüyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Well, I..." {n}The enraged giant draws air into his chest, but suddenly pauses to consider.{/n} "{name}... I think I have heard of you. You truly are stout-hearted, they say, and have proved yourself in the past."

traits.locale_text: "Yani ben..." {n}Öfkeden deliye dönmüş dev, ciğerlerini havayla dolduruyor ancak düşünmek için aniden duraksıyor.{/n} "{name}... Sanırım adını duymuştum. Gerçekten de yiğit olduğunu ve geçmişte kendini kanıtladığını söylüyorlar."
